TVNZ and Newshub job cuts latest: Fate of Sunday to be revealed, plans for new news service mooted https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tvnz-and-newshub-job-cuts-latest-fate-of-sunday-to-be-revealed-plan-to-save-newsroom-mooted/DTEBKE37L5E3TPFMSVFGZHRSGE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tvnz-and-newshub-job-cuts-latest-fate-of-sunday-to-be-revealed-plan-to-save-newsroom-mooted/DTEBKE37L5E3TPFMSVFGZHRSGE/ Raphael Franks, Shayne CurrieFair Go, Midday, Tonight off air from May while plans presented to save parts of Newshub. Tue, 09 Apr 2024 18:31:49 +0000 Newshub presenters Samantha Hayes and Mike McRoberts and TVNZ Sunday host Miriama Kamo. Journalists and viewers will learn this morning whether Newshub will survive a threatened closure - with a possible lifeline being considered - and if TVNZ will keep its current affairs show Sunday. Photos / Instagram / Supplied

600 Hochstetter’s frogs rehomed during Brynderwyn roadworks https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/600-hochstetters-frogs-rehomed-during-brynderwyns-roadworks-project/TYKCYXTY25HJJKTQ6H2VQAQPKU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/600-hochstetters-frogs-rehomed-during-brynderwyns-roadworks-project/TYKCYXTY25HJJKTQ6H2VQAQPKU/ Sarah CurtisThere are strict protocols for construction in the environmentally sensitive Brynderwyns. Tue, 09 Apr 2024 18:00:00 +0000 During recent roading work, the Brynderwyns were discovered to be an important habitat for New Zealand's highly endangered Hochstetter's frog. Photo / Aaron Thompson, Auckland Council.
